Name: Landgrave Alessandro Steiner
Details:
Born 2957.

The previous Archon of the Lyran Commonwealth, Alessandro assumed the throne in 2980 after the death of his father. Following a series of disastrous military losses against the Draconis Combine and the Free Worlds League, his niece Katrina Steiner deposed him in 3007 and became Archon with the support of the Estates General and the Lyran high command.
